summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of 2026 Accountability Tracker. All backend APIs (18/18) and frontend features working perfectly. Dashboard loads correctly, all navigation tabs functional, data entry forms submit successfully, and real-time updates work as expected.
passed_tests: Dashboard summary API with KPIs and reminders
Daily check-in upsert and retrieval functionality
Mortgage tracking (principal payments, balance checks, events table)
All tab navigation (Dashboard, Check-in, Fitness, Mortgage, Relationship, Settings)
Form submissions and real-time data updates
Responsive UI with proper data-testid attributes
